summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Pleasant Valley Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue West and 35th Avenue West, from Emerson Street to Ruffner Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16647 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
